channel.title: The Electric Bicycle That's Also A Pedal Generator
channel.description: The Electric Bicycle That's Also A Pedal Generator

item.title: Before going further, READ THIS: The World Needs To Learn The Value Of A Watt
item.description:
Before going further, READ THIS: The World Needs To Learn The Value Of A Watt

By Adam Boesel. After the Paris Climate Agreement, we're all wondering what comes next. We will need to make changes, maybe even sacrifices. But which ones, and where? I certainly don't have most of those answers, but I do know this: People all over the world, especially in developed nations like the USA, need to learn the value of a watt.

item.title: The Green Microcycle Plus and Plus/Minus
item.description:
The Green Microcycle Plus and Plus/Minus

A bike, an electric bike, and a pedal generator.

item.title: Green Microcycle Plus: The world's first electric bike that doubles as a pedal generator
item.description: Green Microcycle Plus: The world's first electric bike that doubles as a pedal generator

item.title: Mounts In 5 Seconds
item.description:
Mounts In 5 Seconds

The Green Microcycle Mounts Onto Its Charging Stand Very Easily. You can then use it to generate 30-100 watts of grid-tied or off-grid electricity.

item.title: Flatten The Hills on The Green Microcyle
item.description:
Flatten The Hills on The Green Microcyle

Everybody who rides an Electric Bike is amazed and thrilled by how fun it is to pedal with an electric assist. This video shows just how easy it is to zip up a hill, so you can focus on the view instead of the climb.

item.title: The Chopper Charger Grid-Tied Explanation
item.description:
The Chopper Charger Grid-Tied Explanation

The Green Microcycle Prototype was called The Chopper Charger. This video shows the grid-tied capability.
